nodes.label: Starting node
nodes.text: You stand in a dark corridor, with two paths. The left path is completely silent. The right path has cricket sounds

nodes.label: Left path
nodes.text: You keep walking, your footsteps are the only thing breaking the silence. Suddenly, you trip on a rock.

nodes.label: Keep walking
nodes.text: You keep walking and walking but there is no end. You slowly lose consciousness. You want to stop but you just keep walking. You have made a grave mistake.

nodes.label: Death. Yep.
nodes.text: You died. Why did you not turn back, like come on...

nodes.label: Right path
nodes.text: As you keep walking, you start noticing insects beneath your feet.

nodes.label: Rock
nodes.text: The rock turns out to be a button. You click it, and it opens the way out. Congratulations!

selectedNode.label: Keep walking
selectedNode.text: You keep walking and walking but there is no end. You slowly lose consciousness. You want to stop but you just keep walking. You have made a grave mistake.
